info.name: AwesomeBar Popup: No Scrollbar
info.description: Displays all the results from the AwesomeBar at once (without the scrollbar on the side). You can change the number of results editing browser.urlbar.maxRichResults in your about:config settings (default is 12).
info.additionalInfo: Suggestions: - Slimbar; - style 8213 by user 11539 (if you get a blank space on your results list after applying this style, just type something in the URLbar to fix it). P.S.: I discovered an extension that does the same: Locationbar Limit. +1 for Stylish :)
